name: GooglePlayStatusUpdate
description: Update status of an app previously deployed to the Google Play Store
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Play service connection that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceAccountKey
inputs.label: JSON key path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON file provided by Google Play that includes the service account's identity you wish to publish your APK under.

inputs.name: packageName
inputs.label: Package name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique package identifier (e.g. com.foo.myapp) that you wish to update the status.

inputs.name: track
inputs.label: Track
inputs.helpMarkDown: Track you want to update the status of the APK from.

inputs.name: status
inputs.label: Status
inputs.helpMarkDown: The status of the release you want to update to, for details of statuses: https://developers.google.com/android-publisher/api-ref/rest/v3/edits.tracks#status.

inputs.name: userFraction
inputs.label: User fraction
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fraction of the app's users who will receive the update. 0 < fraction < 1. Blank input means keeping userfraction unchanged.

messages.InvalidAuthFilewithName: %s was not a valid auth file
messages.JsonKeyFileNotFound: The service account JSON key file could not be found.
messages.EndpointNotFound: The service connection could not be found.
messages.keepUserFrac: Blank userFraction, maintain the current userFraction.
messages.userFractionInvalid: UserFraction Invalid, userFraction should be a number between 0 - 1.
